short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instead of a password use a key. Private, invisble and cannot be copied and pasted.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension replaces traditional passwords with a secure, invisible key for enhanced privacy and protection. The key is stored privately, ensuring it cannot be seen, copied, or pasted, offering a seamless yet secure login experience. This eliminates the risks associated with password theft and clipboard vulnerabilities, providing users with an invisible layer of security.
